questions.quote: Maybe it was your fault. It wasn't my fault. I can tell you that.
I've been trying to leave this group for 10 years. Vaya con dios.
Oh, my shampoo. Yeah, it is Pantene, I got a free sample in with my junk mail.
Oh, no no no...no more banks. I'm keeping my blood in my freezer with...my money!
Ooh, I've got stump troubles. The Sanitation Department won't get rid of them all, I can't get a truck to haul this stuff until next week. Meanwhile, I'm sitting on a mountain of stumps.
No I can't. I can't die with dignity. I have no dignity. I want to be the one person who doesn't die with dignity. I live my whole life in shame. Why should I die with dignity?
You already have an in. You have the same first name!...  'Jerry'!
Shhhhh. If you want to get in, there's very little time.  Sweetheart..  No, no, no. That ought to cover it.  Just a second. Just a... let me jus-peek...  Come on, come on, come on...
You want a picture like that on a Christmas card? I can do that for you. ...
Let me ask you something. When's the last time you went skiing?
